description.russian: Слова и фразы на корейском языке.
description.english: Words and phrases in the Korean language.

descriptions.russian: гигант, великий человек (네 안에 잠든 거인을 깨워라 - разбуди в себе гиганта) (giant)
найстойчиво, искренне, страстно (earnestly, eagerly, ardently, sincerely, heartily)
не смотря на что-либо (disregard, be not deterred)
высота волны, уровень напряжения (height of wave)
чрезмерность, нелогичность (unreasonableness, irrationality, ―하다 (be) unreasonable, unfair, unnatural)
в такой степени, на таком расстоянии (that much)

description.english: Words and phrases from Disco Elysium videogame

descriptions.english: -Glasses are cool, I guess. -Are they? They're mostly just ____________.
_______ is someone with limited or no ability to use the lower half of their body.
You must forgive me! I'm getting so ___________! I completely forgot to introduce myself.
Her eyes glitter over the ____ of her glasses as she looks up, smiling.
We shouldn't waste any more time on it. If you want my take, ask me after we've ________ the victim.
The kitchen is closed until 13:00 because the cook is working. You can _____ around after that - if you must.
You're barking up the wrong ____. I don't have a key.
Just the nastiest and loudest faction He tosses his head in _______.
